name: Unheil
summary:
Unheil invites you to a thrilling adventure filled with suspense, where you attempt to unravel the mysteries while trying to find the murderer of a crime committed in a cursed mansion in "Unheilsdorf," a town in Northern Germany in 1930. The story begins when the case is assigned to Alexia after a traveling journalist is found dead in the mansion he was investigating.

You'll witness unprecedentedly chilling events as you try to uncover the dark secrets lurking within a cursed mansion alongside Alexia. This village has never returned any of its visitors. Will you be able to escape the clutches of this cursed village?
